```{R}
x=read.csv("Practice/input1.csv",na.strings = "")
totol_event=0
output=data.frame(USER_ID=character(0),Time=character(0),Event=character(0))
for(i in 1:nrow(x)){
    user_id=x[i,"USERID"]
    n_element=length(which(!is.na(x[i,]))==T)-1
    if(n_element==0) next
    x[i,which(x[i,]=='s')]=1
    x[i,which(x[i,]=='e')]=n_element
    for(j in 1:n_element){
        e<-colnames(x[i,])[which(x[i,]==j)]
        t<-as.character(j)
        output=rbind(output,data.frame(USER_ID=user_id,Time=t,Event=e))
    }
}
write.csv(output,"Practice/output.csv",quote=F,row.names=F)


```
